system.descriptionText: Can force Critical Damage as a result of Righteous Fury to be rerolled, but must accept the new roll even if it is worse. If a Vehicle with this trait is set on fire, putting it out is a Free Action.

description.value: Can force Critical Damage as a result of Righteous Fury to be rerolled, but must accept the new roll even if it is worse. If a Vehicle with this trait is set on fire, putting it out is a Free Action.
